result.html: Bhí slua mór daoine bailithe timpeall an tí agus dreach an bhróin ar a n-aghaidhA large crowd of people was gathered around the house with looks of sadness on their faces.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí slua mór daoine bailiṫe timpeall an tí agus dreaċ an ḃróin ar a n-aġaiḋA large crowd of people was gathered around the house with looks of sadness on their faces.

result.eng: As part of this dirty conspiracy, the prince was put in the mad house.
result.ga: Mar chuid den uisce faoi thalamh lofa seo cuireadh an prionsa i dteach na ngealt
result.orig: Mar chuid den uisce faoi thalamh lofa seo cuireadh an prionsa i dteach na ngealt
result.html: Mar chuid den uisce faoi thalamh lofa seo cuireadh an prionsa i dteach na ngealtAs part of this dirty conspiracy, the prince was put in the mad house.
result.ponchtml: Mar ċuid den uisce faoi ṫalaṁ lofa seo cuireaḋ an prionsa i dteaċ na ngealtAs part of this dirty conspiracy, the prince was put in the mad house.

result.eng: The house is falling apart.
result.ga: Tá an teach ag titim as a chéile
result.orig: Tá an teach ag titim as a chéile
result.html: Tá an teach ag titim as a chéileThe house is falling apart.
result.ponchtml: Tá an teaċ ag titim as a ċéileThe house is falling apart.

result.eng: The pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
result.ga: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh ann
result.orig: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh ann
result.html: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh annThe pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an pota ċoṁ mór sin go ḃféadfá braċán do ṫeaċ lán boċtán a ḋéanaṁ annThe pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.

result.eng: The house is located on the edge of the city.
result.ga: Tá an teach suite ar imeall na cathrach
result.orig: Tá an teach suite ar imeall na cathrach
result.html: Tá an teach suite ar imeall na cathrachThe house is located on the edge of the city.
result.ponchtml: Tá an teaċ suite ar imeall na caṫraċThe house is located on the edge of the city.

result.eng: They were renovating the house.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag athchóiriú an tí
result.orig: Bhí siad ag athchóiriú an tí
result.html: Bhí siad ag athchóiriú an tíThey were renovating the house.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag aṫċóiriú an tíThey were renovating the house.

result.eng: Along with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.
result.ga: Fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadh
result.orig: Fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadh
result.html: Fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadhAlong with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.
result.ponchtml: Fara aire a ṫaḃairt don leanḃ ḃí uirṫi an teaċ a ġlanaḋAlong with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.

result.eng: She was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.
result.ga: Ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonar
result.orig: Ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonar
result.html: Ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonarShe was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ cead aici dul amaċ as an teaċ ina haonarShe was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.

result.eng: Up I went to room 1026 at the top of the house.
result.ga: Suas liom go seomra 1026 ar bharr an tí
result.orig: Suas liom go seomra 1026 ar bharr an tí
result.html: Suas liom go seomra 1026 ar bharr an tíUp I went to room 1026 at the top of the house.
result.ponchtml: Suas liom go seomra 1026 ar ḃarr an tíUp I went to room 1026 at the top of the house.

result.eng: If he has a big house and good clothes, he should be thankful for them.
result.ga: Má tá teach mór agus culaith mhaith éadaigh aigesean altaíodh sé iad
result.orig: Má tá teach mór agus culaith mhaith éadaigh aigesean altaíodh sé iad
result.html: Má tá teach mór agus culaith mhaith éadaigh aigesean altaíodh sé iadIf he has a big house and good clothes, he should be thankful for them.
result.ponchtml: Má tá teaċ mór agus culaiṫ ṁaiṫ éadaiġ aigesean altaíoḋ sé iadIf he has a big house and good clothes, he should be thankful for them.

result.eng: At that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.
result.ga: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar air
result.orig: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar air
result.html: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar airAt that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.
result.ponchtml: Leis sin isteaċ le fear an tí agus cuma scaollṁar airAt that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.

result.eng: Now now, you have everybody in the house confused with your stories.
result.ga: Seo seo tá a bhfuil sa teach amú ag do chuid scéalta
result.orig: Seo seo tá a bhfuil sa teach amú ag do chuid scéalta
result.html: Seo seo tá a bhfuil sa teach amú ag do chuid scéaltaNow now, you have everybody in the house confused with your stories.
result.ponchtml: Seo seo tá a ḃfuil sa teaċ amú ag do ċuid scéaltaNow now, you have everybody in the house confused with your stories.

result.eng: Everybody who ever died in this house.
result.ga: Iomlán a bhfuair bás sa teach seo riamh
result.orig: Iomlán a bhfuair bás sa teach seo riamh
result.html: Iomlán a bhfuair bás sa teach seo riamhEverybody who ever died in this house.
result.ponchtml: Iomlán a ḃfuair bás sa teaċ seo riaṁEverybody who ever died in this house.

result.eng: Everybody in the house said in unison.
result.ga: Arsa bunadh an tí as béal a chéile
result.orig: Arsa bunadh an tí as béal a chéile
result.html: Arsa bunadh an tí as béal a chéileEverybody in the house said in unison.
result.ponchtml: Arsa bunaḋ an tí as béal a ċéileEverybody in the house said in unison.

result.eng: She'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!
result.ga: B'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé mise
result.orig: B'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé mise
result.html: B'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé miseShe'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!
result.ponchtml: B'ḟada i dteaċ na mboċt nó ag cruinniú na déirce í aċ go bé miseShe'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!
